name: Ludicolo

passive.name: Rain Dance
passive.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Water Energy to a Pokemon with a Grass Energy attached to it, or vice versa.

attacks.name: Agua Fiesta
attacks.effect: For each Water Energy attached to Ludicolo not used to pay for this attack's cost, this attack deals 10 more damage.

flavor: Ducks? Plants? Who knows, these things just like to party.
